The video claims to show Gianna Bryant i: but the expert's verdict confirms that this did not happen. Gianna Bryant died with her father Kobe Bryant in the helicopter crash on Jan. 26.
The video titled: Kobe Bryant Daughter Gianna Bryant Final Hours" was uploaded to YouTube the day after the crash. It shows a young girl laying motionless on a hospital bed, being moved down a hallway lined with doctors and nurses. In the second part of the video, she is surrounded by hospital staff and mourners.
The video was flagged by Facebook as par: It has been shared thousands of times and has gained significant views and likes on YouTube and TikTok. However, the expert's verdict confirms that the video is not authentic.
The video actually features a 28: year-old woman named Ariana Cervantes, who was killed in a traffic collision on Aug. 28, 2019, in Downey, Calif. The video titled "Ariana’s Honor Walk" was uploaded to YouTube on Sept. 4, 2019. Cervantes was an organ donor, and the video shows her honor walk, a ritual performed to show respect to dying patients planning to donate their organs.
